response_parsed.title: Harden Batch Jobs Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer demonstrates how to secure and harden batch jobs in a Python 3.12+ application using the FastAPI framework.
key_points: Leverage FastAPI for building secure and efficient APIs
Implement rate limiting and CORS control
Secure batch job handling with proper input validation
Handle errors gracefully and log important events
